ProductInfo.Features:
Like all phones in the Sony Xperia NXT series, it has a simple, strong design language. And Xperia P takes it one step further the precision crafted, full aluminum unibody gives this Android phone a unique, durable and modern look.
The 4-Inch Reality Display powered by the Mobile BRAVIA Engine also includes Sony?s unique White Magic technology, making the colors in your favorite clips and stills look as sharp and clear as if you were inside.
Make sure you always get the right shot with your phone?s fast capture 8 megapixel camera. Just over a second from sleep to snap, and just one second between shots.
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Xperia P LT22I Unlocked Android Phone--U.S. Warranty (Pink)
